key.name: host
key.description: The base URL of the Jira server.

key.name: jqls
key.description: The queries to show in the panel menu.

key.name: default-duration
key.description: The default duration of a work-log in minutes

key.name: issue-cache
key.description: Serialized array of the most recent issues.

key.name: nag-notifications
key.description: Show a notification when not tracking time

key.name: nag-notification-interval
key.description: The interval in seconds at which to show the nag notifications when enabled.
